channel.title: Client Hub - Making everything easier
channel.description:
[B][SIZE=18pt][COLOR=red]Client hub - Making everything easier.[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/nWzlV9e.png[/img]
[B][COLOR=green][SIZE=14pt]What is this?[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B] This is a little server-client system which helps making updates to client and cache easier as well as a handy addition for your users.
You run the hub server next to your rsps server and let people download the hub instead of the client. When you push updates via the hub server people launching their hub will automatically download the updates. So there's no need for re-downloading clients. Everything is downloaded into the home folder. It has some other useful menu's for the players, see features.
[B][COLOR=green][SIZE=14pt]Features[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[ul][li]Themes[/li] [li]Ping[/li] [li]Preferences[/li] [li]Help links via the menu (donating, voting, forums...)[/li] [li]Possible to move the hub to the system tray[/li] [li]Logging (users can send bugs/suggestions which is logged on the server)[/li] [li]NIO channel downloading for faster downloads than what most clients use.[/li][/ul]
[B][COLOR=green][SIZE=14pt]Media[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[b]Server sided update pushing[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wv3h6ag.png[/img]
[b]Updating[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/63UweCp.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/i63FPPt.png[/img]
[B]Preferences:[/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8S27ib1.png[/img]
[B]Themes[/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QITFMAe.png[/img]
[b]Menu's[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/X1f3rLB.png[/img]
[b]System tray[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/FaUxPOM.png[/img]
[B][COLOR=green][SIZE=14pt]Downloads[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B] [b]Base pack: [/b]http://www.mediafire.com/download/ceh4qn22abi6i1a/CX_Hub.rar [b]Advanced pack: [/b]http://www.mediafire.com/download/5r0ph3kaqpjd0cu/CX_Hub_advanced.rar [i]Advanced packet contains the shared library in case you want to modify the networking.[/i]
[B][COLOR=green][SIZE=14pt]Notes if you want to use this[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[ul][li]Replace images in the Resources.jar from the client[/li] [li]Change the names to yours including the download location[/li] [li]Change the IP of the server to your HOST ip, localhost causes issues[/li] [li]Change the client IP to your host IP[/li][/ul]

item.title: Client Hub - Making everything easier
item.dc:creator: @Damoiscool Damoiscool
item.description:
@Damoiscool wrote:

Thats awesome! Good job man. If I get back into RSPS developing I’ll definitely use this!

Read full topic

item.title: Client Hub - Making everything easier
item.dc:creator: @jaximus jaximus
item.description:
@jaximus wrote:

Nice and simple looking man, ill download to use later!
cheers!

[spoiler][quote=“RandQm, post:1, topic:548655”][B][SIZE=18pt][COLOR=red]Client hub - Making everything easier.[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]

[B][COLOR=green][SIZE=14pt]What is this?[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
This is a little server-client system which helps making updates to client and cache easier
as well as a handy addition for your users.

You run the hub server next to your rsps server and let people download the hub instead of the client.
When you push updates via the hub server people launching their hub will automatically download the updates.
So there’s no need for re-downloading clients.
Everything is downloaded into the home folder.
It has some other useful menu’s for the players, see features.

[B][COLOR=green][SIZE=14pt]Features[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]

[ul][li]Themes[/li]
[li]Ping[/li]
[li]Preferences[/li]
[li]Help links via the menu (donating, voting, forums…)[/li]
[li]Possible to move the hub to the system tray[/li]
[li]Logging (users can send bugs/suggestions which is logged on the server)[/li]
[li]NIO channel downloading for faster downloads than what most clients use.[/li][/ul]

[B][COLOR=green][SIZE=14pt]Media[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]

Server sided update pushing

Updating

[B]Preferences:[/B]

[B]Themes[/B]

Menu’s

System tray

[B][COLOR=green][SIZE=14pt]Downloads[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
Base pack: http://www.mediafire.com/download/ceh4qn22abi6i1a/CX_Hub.rar
Advanced pack: http://www.mediafire.com/download/5r0ph3kaqpjd0cu/CX_Hub_advanced.rar
Advanced packet contains the shared library in case you want to modify the networking.

[B][COLOR=green][SIZE=14pt]Notes if you want to use this[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]

[ul][li]Replace images in the Resources.jar from the client[/li]
[li]Change the names to yours including the download location[/li]
[li]Change the IP of the server to your HOST ip, localhost causes issues[/li]
[li]Change the client IP to your host IP[/li][/ul][/quote][/spoiler]
